kv16.6:2.5_0: nanu anārammaṇaṁ, natthi tassa āvaṭṭanā …pe… paṇidhīti?
kv16.6:2.7_0: Hañci anārammaṇaṁ, natthi tassa āvaṭṭanā …pe… paṇidhi, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv16.6:3.1_0: Alobho sahetuko sārammaṇo, atthi tassa āvaṭṭanā …pe… paṇidhīti?
kv16.6:3.3_0: Rūpaṁ sahetukaṁ sārammaṇaṁ, atthi tassa āvaṭṭanā …pe… paṇidhīti?
kv16.6:3.21_0: anottappaṁ sahetukaṁ sārammaṇaṁ, atthi tassa āvaṭṭanā …pe… paṇidhīti?
kv16.6:3.23_0: Rūpaṁ sahetukaṁ sārammaṇaṁ, atthi tassa āvaṭṭanā …pe… paṇidhīti?
kv16.6:4.1_0: Rūpaṁ sahetukaṁ anārammaṇaṁ, natthi tassa āvaṭṭanā …pe… paṇidhīti?
kv16.6:4.3_0: Alobho sahetuko anārammaṇo, natthi tassa āvaṭṭanā …pe… paṇidhīti?
kv16.6:4.5_0: rūpaṁ sahetukaṁ anārammaṇaṁ, natthi tassa āvaṭṭanā …pe… paṇidhīti?
kv16.6:4.8_0: anottappaṁ sahetukaṁ anārammaṇaṁ, natthi tassa āvaṭṭanā …pe… paṇidhīti?
kv16.6:5.6_0: Hañci rūpaṁ sappaccayaṁ, tena vata re vattabbe—
